sentences.en: Hosiery: Knit or woven coverings for the feet and legs, worn inside shoes.

sentences.en: Never go without hosiery and don't wear sandals.

sentences.en: Referring to my conversation with you today, I now enclose an order sheet for hosiery as specified.
